title: What was acceptable or normalised in the 80s or even 90s but is completely unacceptable nowadays? - Quora

response.answer_text: Politically incorrect humor in movies. This went from the 1970s through the early 2000s. Try making Animal House, Airplane, the Blues Brothers, any Will Farrell movie or Mel Brooks movie etc. and see what happens today. No studio would accept such a script. I think it’s amusing actually because society was so strict on music (such as hip hop) but people could be crass, crude, and what many people today would call racist in films. I think those movies are hilarious. It’s sad that we won’t get more of them.
